content: the apiarist cowl boasts loads of texture in a fun honeycomb formation throughout with a simple versatile ribbed cuff on both ends created with dk and mohair it offers the perfect sense of cozy for those cooler months while not being overbearing or having shawl ends always coming untucked quick simple yet oh so satisfying yarn you ll need a full skein of dk appx 230+ yards and a skein of mohair or suri silk if mohair isn t your thing or allergies you can knit it with a single strand of worsted weight yarn needles 20 us6/4mm us6/4mm dpns optional cable needle
